word:
We are ever to consider that no amount of property can make us independent of God. He gives us intellect, He gives us life and health; if we will obey His sovereign will, His blessing will abide with us. His word is our assurance. There is no dependence to be placed on property, and wealth cannot 


                                   -262- 

keep us in peace. We may depend upon it, but it cannot be our physician to heal or restore us from infirmities.
